name: pomodojov2
description: **Pomodojov2** is a modern, customizable Pomodoro timer application designed to enhance your productivity with style. This refined version of my beginner project features clean, modular code, smooth animations, error handling, and a responsive design.
author: Yaohui (Joey) Zhang JZHANG1565@GMAIL.COM https://www.linkedin.com/in/joeyzhang1576/
